Remarks: Typical Angina (TA), Atypical Angina (ATA), Non-Anginal Pain (NAP), Asymptomatic (ASY)

Description: Resting blood pressure (On admission to the hospital)
Fasting blood sugar. More than 120mg/dl considered prediabetic.

Remarks: Normal, ST-T wave abnormality, Left ventricular hypertrophy

Description: ST depression induced by exercise relative to rest.
ST_Slope: the slope of the peak exercise ST segment

Remarks: Dropped from dataset (Null), Fixed Defect (No blood flow in some part of the heart), Normal Blood Flow and Reversible Defect (A blood flow is observed but it is not normal)
